nodes.text: Heerimus was a male Human representative who served Senator Doli-bur Barc in the Galactic Republic Senate during the Cold War with the resurgent Sith Empire.

A Human male, Heerimus was a young man serving in Senator Doli-bur Barc's administration in the Galactic Republic Senate around 3643 BBY following the Great Galactic War and the resurgence of the Sith Empire. Part of the Cold War-era Senate, Heerimus represented the interests of Senator Barc when interacting with the Coruscant Security Force and other groups on Coruscant. When a shipment destined for Barc's offices was hijacked, Heerimus soght out an individual who could bolster the search for the missing data chips.
Heerimus appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic Coruscant quest called "The Senator's Stolen Goods".
